title: Talwan's Vengeance
description: Eighteen-year-old Loslin Kelser has had to grow up fast and has gone from being a slave to a feared master pirate. His ship, the Talwan, takes him, his brother West, sidekick Tarana, and a ship full of ex-slave teens, on the adventure of their lives. In their quest to uncover the truth about a mysterious scroll linked to the Kelser family, the crew of the Talwan encounters perils and discovers secrets hidden for years.This book is clean YA Fantasy.
author: Christy  Newman
